extensionDescription.message: Chrome extension to export Lodestone diary entries in Markdown format.

exportAllArticlesButton.description: Text for the button to export all articles.

exportAllArticlesButtonFirstPage.message: Go to Page 1 and Export All
exportAllArticlesButtonFirstPage.description: Text for the export all articles button from other pages

exportCurrentArticleButton.description: Text for the button to export the current article.

accessIntervalLabel.description: Label for the access interval input field.

confirmationText.description: Confirmation text before exporting all articles.

yesButton.description: Text for the Yes button in confirmation dialog.

noButton.description: Text for the No button in confirmation dialog.

lodestoneExportDescription.message: Export your Lodestone diary entries in Markdown format.

notOnBlogListPageError.message: Please run this on a Lodestone blog list page.
notOnBlogListPageError.description: Error message when not on blog list page

notOnBlogPageError.message: Please run this on a Lodestone blog page.
notOnBlogPageError.description: Error message when not on blog page

notOnIndividualArticlePageError.message: Please run this on an individual Lodestone article page or edit page.
notOnIndividualArticlePageError.description: Error message when not on individual article page

imageDownloadHeader.description: Header text for image download progress

articleProcessHeader.description: Header text for article processing progress
